Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Class OutputtablePassage

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage.AbstractPassage
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage.OutputtablePassage
All Implemented Interfaces:
PassageOutputtingInterface, PassageOutputtingLinkCheckingInterface, PassageReadingInterface, SharedPassage, Heccable, Parseable
public class OutputtablePassage extends AbstractPassage implements PassageReadingInterface, PassageOutputtingInterface
A version of the AbstractPassage used within HECC-UP.
